guides.title: Access the Privacy Center
guides.why: Manage data use, audience visibility, and protections.

steps.title: Open menu
steps.body: Click your profile picture (top right).

steps.title: Settings & Privacy
steps.body: Choose **Settings & Privacy** → **Privacy Center**.

steps.title: Common Privacy Settings
steps.body: On the left menu, open **Common Privacy Settings**.

steps.title: Review sections
steps.body: Focus on account security, audience visibility, and profile data.

guides.title: Use Privacy Checkup
guides.why: Guided review of who sees your info and how data is used.

steps.title: Open menu
steps.body: Click your profile picture → **Settings & Privacy**.

steps.title: Open tool
steps.body: Select **Privacy Checkup**.

steps.title: Who Can See What
steps.body: Adjust visibility for profile info, posts, and stories.

steps.title: How People Find You
steps.body: Control friend requests and search engine visibility.

steps.title: Data Settings & Security
steps.body: Review connected apps and enable alerts/2FA.

steps.title: Ad Preferences
steps.body: Tune the types of ads and how data targets you.

steps.title: Open Settings
steps.body: Profile picture → **Settings & Privacy** → **Settings**.

steps.title: Security and Login
steps.body: Choose **Security and Login**.

steps.title: Change Password
steps.body: Under **Login**, click **Change Password** and save.

guides.title: Enable Two‑Factor Authentication (2FA)
guides.why: Adds a second verification step during login.

steps.title: Security & Login
steps.body: Open **Settings** → **Security and Login**.

steps.title: Start 2FA
steps.body: Click **Use two‑factor authentication**.

steps.title: Pick a method
steps.body: Choose SMS, **Authenticator app (recommended)**, or **Security key**.

steps.title: Finish
steps.body: Follow the prompts to complete setup.

guides.title: Review logged‑in devices & log out others

steps.title: Open Where You’re Logged In
steps.body: Settings → **Security and Login**.

steps.title: See more
steps.body: Click **See More** to view all devices.

steps.title: Log out suspicious devices
steps.body: Use the ⋯ menu next to a device → **Log Out**.

steps.title: Open About
steps.body: Go to your profile → **About** → **Contact and Basic Info**.

steps.title: Edit item
steps.body: Hover and click the pencil icon on phone or email.

steps.title: Hide or remove
steps.body: Set audience to **Only Me** or choose **Remove**, then **Save**.

steps.title: Settings → Privacy
steps.body: Profile picture → **Settings & Privacy** → **Settings** → **Privacy**.

steps.title: Adjust details
steps.body: Set the audience for items like birthday, relationships, work/education.

steps.title: Find the post
steps.body: Go to your profile and scroll to the post.

steps.title: Open menu
steps.body: Tap the ⋯ (three dots) on the post.

steps.title: Move to Trash
steps.body: Select **Move to Trash** → **Move** to confirm (kept for 30 days).

steps.title: Open Activity Log
steps.body: Profile menu → **Settings & Privacy** → **Activity Log**.

steps.title: Trash
steps.body: Choose **Trash** to review deleted items.

steps.title: Restore or delete
steps.body: Use ⋯ next to an item to **Restore** or **Permanently delete**.

steps.title: Open Privacy settings
steps.body: Settings → **Privacy**.

steps.title: Limit Past Posts
steps.body: Under **Your Activity**, click **Limit Past Posts** and confirm (cannot be undone in one click).

guides.title: Remove a tag from a post or photo

steps.title: Activity Log
steps.body: Open **Activity Log**.

steps.title: Tagged items
steps.body: Open **Posts You’re Tagged In** or **Photos You’re Tagged In**.

steps.title: Remove tag
steps.body: Use ⋯ → **Remove Tag** and confirm.

guides.title: Edit audience or delete a photo album

steps.title: Open Photos → Albums
steps.body: From your profile, go to **Photos** → **Albums**.

steps.title: Album menu
steps.body: Hover an album → ⋯ menu.

steps.title: Edit or delete
steps.body: Choose **Edit Album** (change audience) or **Delete Album**.

steps.title: Note
steps.body: Some system albums cannot be deleted; delete photos inside instead.

steps.title: Profile and Tagging
steps.body: Settings → **Profile and Tagging**.

steps.title: Adjust Tagging
steps.body: Set who can tag you in posts.

guides.title: Control who can see posts you’re tagged in

steps.title: Profile and Tagging
steps.body: Settings → **Profile and Tagging**.

steps.title: Audience for tagged posts
steps.body: Set who can see posts you’re tagged in on your profile.

schematic.title: Who can see posts you’re tagged in

steps.title: Face recognition settings
steps.body: Open **Settings** and search **Face recognition** (if available).

steps.title: Disable
steps.body: Set **Do you want Facebook to be able to recognize you in photos and videos?** to **No** (or off).

steps.title: Note
steps.body: If the setting isn’t present, it may be deprecated for your region/account.

guides.title: Restrict who can find you via email/phone

steps.title: Privacy settings
steps.body: Settings → **Privacy** → **How People Find and Contact You**.

steps.title: Set limits
steps.body: For email and phone, choose **Only Me** or **Friends**.

guides.title: Control who can send you friend requests

steps.title: Privacy settings
steps.body: Settings → **Privacy**.

steps.title: Requests audience
steps.body: Set **Who can send you friend requests?** to **Friends of Friends** for tighter control.

guides.title: Remove access for third‑party apps & sites

steps.title: Apps and Websites
steps.body: Settings → **Apps and Websites**.

steps.title: Review & remove
steps.body: Under **Active**, remove apps you don’t use; optionally delete content posted by them.

guides.title: Adjust ad preferences and data usage

steps.title: Open Ads settings
steps.body: Settings → **Ads**.

steps.title: Partners data
steps.body: Set **Ads based on data from partners** to **Not Allowed**.

steps.title: Off‑platform activity
steps.body: Turn off **Activity on Facebook products used elsewhere** for ad targeting.

steps.title: Sensitive categories
steps.body: Remove sensitive categories under **Categories used to reach you**.

steps.title: Advertisers
steps.body: Review advertisers you’ve interacted with and hide those you don’t want.

guides.title: Clear old devices from login history

steps.title: Where You’re Logged In
steps.body: Settings → **Security and Login** → **See More**.

steps.title: Log out stale sessions
steps.body: Use ⋯ next to device → **Log Out**.

steps.title: Activity Log
steps.body: Open **Activity Log**.

steps.title: Search history
steps.body: **Logged Actions and Other Activity** → **Search History**.

steps.title: Clear
steps.body: Delete items individually or use **Clear All**.

steps.title: Your Facebook Information
steps.body: Settings → **Your Facebook Information** → **Download Your Information**.

steps.title: Choose data & format
steps.body: Pick content, format (HTML/JSON), time range → **Create File**.

steps.title: Open Deactivation & Deletion
steps.body: Settings → **Your Facebook Information** → **Deactivation and Deletion**.

steps.title: Choose path
steps.body: **Deactivate** (temporary) or **Delete** (permanent). Follow prompts.
